column2: Visited by Faithful Saints in service to [cao_dai.GetName].
Visited by Wise Saints in service to [cao_dai.GetName].
Visited by Powerful Saints in service to [cao_dai.GetName].
Visited by Balanced Saints in service to [cao_dai.GetName].
This character follows the Koshitsu school of [shinto.GetName]ism, venerating Amaterasu and the Emperor.
This character follows the Minzoku school of [shinto.GetName]ism, following a large and varying list of local practices.
This character follows the Bukka school of [shinto.GetName]ism, focusing on the esoteric aspects of the faith.
Chan emphasizes meditation as a means to free the constraints of the mind and reach a state of Zen where delusions of the apparent world falls away.

The Esoteric Buddhist hold to the Samni or "three mysteries" believing that rituals can bring about enlightment and understanding. Greatly venerated among them are tantric beings such as Cundi and Mahakala.
The Humanistic school focuses on social action, shunning cloistered monks and distant ascetics, instead urging monks to engage with this world so that one can create a pure land in this world.

The Lotus Sutra tradition, sometimes called Ekayana, focuses strongly on the Lotus Sutra as the final teaching of the Buddha, seeing all teachings as expedient means culminating in the final awakening that comes from the study of the Lotus Sutra itself.
The Maitreyans are fiercely devoted to the Maitreya, the Buddha of the future, and wish to prepare for his coming appearance in the world.

Pure Land Movement emphasize devotion to Amitabha as they believe that enlightenment outside the Pure Lands is far too difficult for to be undertaken by mere humans, thus the goal is for a rebirth into his domain.
This character has committed to a vegetarian diet.
This character, though not a follower of any of the [japonic.GetGroupName] faiths, has a special sympathy and understanding for those faiths and their practicioners.
This character, though not a follower of any of the [eastern.GetGroupName] faiths, has a special sympathy and understanding for those faiths and their practicioners.
This character, though not a [mormon.GetName], has a special sympathy and understanding for the [mormon.GetName] faith and its practitioners.
This character, though not a follower of any of the [oldworld.GetGroupName] faiths, has a special sympathy and understanding for those faiths and their practicioners.
This character, though not a [nautical.GetGroupName], has a special sympathy and understanding for the [brethren.GetName] faith and its practicioners.
This character is a proficient musician, using [GetHerHis] voice and various instruments to play both ballads of yore and brand-new compositions.
This figure is only known through oral tradition, fragmentary Old World documentation or is simply surrounded by so much myth that no one can separate fact from fiction anymore.
This character is a devout follower of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], attempting to follow a righteous and holy path of life.
When this character speaks, they speak with a natural authoritative tone
column3: Lorsque ce personnage parle, il s'exprime avec un ton naturellement autoritaire
column6: Cuando este personaje habla, siempre lo hace con un tono natural de autoridad

column2: This character uses very inappropriate language!
column3: Ce personnage utilise un langage inapproprié !

column2: This character believes that the ends justify the means, and will stop at nothing to achieve their goals.
column3: Ce personnage pense que la fin justifie les moyens et ne reculera devant rien pour atteindre ses objectifs.
column6: Este personaje piensa que el fin justifica los medios y no reculará ante nadie para lograr sus objetivos.

column2: This character is a firm believer in the importance of duty, mercy, and honor.
column3: Ce personnage croit fermement en l'importance du devoir, de la pitié et de l'honneur.
column6: Este personaje cree firmemente en la importancia del deber, la piedad y el honor.

column2: This character will do more than most for their kinsmen.
column3: Ce personnage fera tout ce qu'il peut pour sa parenté.
column6: Este personaje hará todo lo que pueda por su familia.

column2: This character is old and their eyes no longer have the ability to see
column3: Ce personnage est âgé et a perdu la vue
column6: Este personaje es un anciano y ha perdido la vista

column2: This character suffered a serious injury in the past, and has lost usage of a part of his body. This has left them unable to move without great difficulty.
column3: Ce personnage a souffert d'une sérieuse blessure par le passé et il a perdu l'usage d'un de ses membres. Cela l'empêche de se mouvoir correctement ou sans souffrir atrocement.
column6: Este personaje sufrió una lesión grave en el pasado y ha perdido el uso de uno de sus miembros.
